org.apache.flink.metrics

类 MetricConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>

        • java.util.Properties
          • org.apache.flink.metrics.MetricConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class MetricConfig
extends java.util.Properties
    A properties class with added utility method to extract primitives.

      • getInteger

        public int getInteger(java.lang.String key,
                      int defaultValue)
        Searches for the property with the specified key in this property list. If the key is not found in this property list, the default property list, and its defaults, recursively, are then checked. The method returns the default value argument if the property is not found.
        参数:
        key - the hashtable key.
        defaultValue - a default value.
        返回:
        the value in this property list with the specified key value parsed as an int.
